name: Dig Tycoon - Idle Game
description:
Welcome to the world of digging, it’s time to work with loaders and excavators at off road areas. By the help of excavators you will dig out the raw materials from a land and load it on the loader trucks which will then transport the raw material to the construction site for building roads, buildings and infrastructure.


Dig Tycoon Idle Game Features:
· Amazing off road landscapes.
· Smooth loader trucks movements.
· Proficient excavator digging functionalities.
· Satisfying digging, loading, transporting and building experience.
